1{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
2
3-- | Global parameters.
4
5module Koshucode.Baala.Core.Relmap.Global
6  ( -- * Global parameter
7    Global' (..),
8    globalVersionText,
9    globalCommandLine,
10    globalFill,
11    globalRops, globalRopsAdd,
12    globalCops,
13    globalInfix,
14    globalAbort,
15    global',
16
17    -- * Getting global parameter
18    GetGlobal' (..),
19    GetGlobal (..),
20
21    -- * Operator set
22    OpSet' (..),
23    opsetFill,
24
25    -- * Feature
26    Feature (..),
27  ) where
28
29import qualified Data.Version                        as Ver
30import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Overture            as O
31import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base                as B
32import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Syntax              as S
33import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Type                as T
34import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Data                as D
35import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Core.Relmap.Option  as C
36import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Core.Relmap.Rop     as C
37import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Core.Relmap.Result  as C
38
39
40-- ----------------------  Global
41
42-- | Global parameters
43data Global' h c = Global
44      { globalSynopsis     :: String            -- ^ One-line description of calculator
45      , globalVersion      :: Ver.Version       -- ^ Version of calculator
46      , globalOpset        :: OpSet' h c        -- ^ Set of operators
47      , globalFeature      :: Feature           -- ^ Features
48      , globalProgram      :: String            -- ^ Name of invoked program
49      , globalArgs         :: [String]          -- ^ Command line arguments
50      , globalProxy        :: [B.HttpProxy]     -- ^ Proxy setting from environment variables
51      , globalTime         :: T.Time            -- ^ Invocation time
52      , globalResult       :: C.Result c        -- ^ Result template
53      , globalOption       :: C.Option c        -- ^ Options
54      , globalSourceLimit  :: Int               -- ^ Limit number of including sources
55      , globalSourceCount  :: Int               -- ^ Sequential number for sources
56      , globalSources      :: [B.IxIOPoint]     -- ^ Included sources
57      , globalHook         :: h c               -- ^ Usually, data resource is used as hook
58      }
59
60instance Show (Global' h c) where
61    show Global { globalVersion = ver }
62        = "Global (" ++ show ver ++ ")"
63
64-- | Textual representation of version number.
65globalVersionText :: Global' h c -> String
66globalVersionText = Ver.showVersion . globalVersion
67
68-- | Command line text, i.e., program name and arguments.
69globalCommandLine :: Global' h c -> [String]
70globalCommandLine Global { globalProgram = prog, globalArgs = args }
71    = prog : args
72
73-- | Make complete global parameter by filling auto-generated part.
74globalFill :: (D.CContent c) => O.Map (Global' h c)
75globalFill g = g
76
77-- | List of relmap operators.
78globalRops :: Global' h c -> [C.Rop' h c]
79globalRops = opsetRopList . globalOpset
80
81-- | Add relmap operators.
82globalRopsAdd :: [C.Rop' h c] -> O.Map (Global' h c)
83globalRopsAdd rops g = g { globalOpset = opsetFill ops' } where
84    ops' = opsetRopsAdd rops ops
85    ops  = globalOpset g
86
87-- | List of content operators.
88globalCops :: Global' h c -> [D.Cop c]
89globalCops = D.copsetCopList . D.getCops
90
91-- | List of settings of infix operators.
92globalInfix :: Global' h c -> [(S.Chars, B.InfixHeight)]
93globalInfix = D.copsetInfixList . opsetCop . globalOpset
94
95-- | Abort with command line.
96globalAbort :: Global' h c -> B.AbortReason -> IO a
97globalAbort = B.abortCommand . globalCommandLine
98
99-- | Empty global parameters.
100global' :: (Show c, D.CBool c, D.CText c) => h c -> Global' h c
101global' h = Global
102    { globalSynopsis     = "koshu"
103    , globalVersion      = Ver.Version [] []
104    , globalOpset        = B.def
105    , globalFeature      = B.def
106    , globalProgram      = ""
107    , globalArgs         = []
108    , globalProxy        = []
109    , globalTime         = B.def
110    , globalResult       = B.def
111    , globalOption       = C.option
112    , globalSourceLimit  = 1000
113    , globalSourceCount  = 0
114    , globalSources      = []
115    , globalHook         = h }
116
117
118-- ----------------------  Getting global parameter
119
120-- | Type which has global parameter.
121class GetGlobal' h where
122    -- | Get global parameter.
123    getGlobal' :: h c -> Global' h c
124
125-- | Type which has global parameter.
126class GetGlobal a where
127    -- | Get global parameter.
128    getGlobal :: (GetGlobal' h) => a h c -> Global' h c
129
130-- | Get global parameter from relmap intermediate data.
131instance GetGlobal C.Intmed' where
132    getGlobal = getGlobal' . C.medHook
133
134instance D.GetCops (Global' h) where
135    getCops = opsetCop . globalOpset
136
137
138-- ----------------------  Operator set
139
140-- | Set of relmap and content operators.
141data OpSet' h c = OpSet
142    { opsetRopList  :: [C.Rop' h c]     -- ^ Relmap operators.
143    , opsetFindRop  :: C.FindRop' h c   -- ^ Operator finder.
144    , opsetCop      :: D.CopSet c       -- ^ Content operators.
145    }
146
147-- | Empty operator set.
148instance B.Default (OpSet' h c) where
149    def = OpSet { opsetRopList = []
150                , opsetFindRop = O.nothing
151                , opsetCop     = B.def }
152
153-- | Make complete operator set by filling auto-generated part.
154opsetFill :: O.Map (OpSet' h c)
155opsetFill ops = ops2 where
156    ops2      = ops { opsetFindRop = findRop
157                    , opsetCop     = copset2 }
158    copset2   = D.copsetFill $ opsetCop ops
159    findRop   = B.assocFinder rops
160    rops      = map name $ opsetRopList ops
161    name rop  = (B.name rop, rop)
162
163opsetRopsAdd :: [C.Rop' h c] -> O.Map (OpSet' h c)
164opsetRopsAdd rops ops = ops { opsetRopList = rops ++ opsetRopList ops }
165
166
167-- ----------------------  Feature
168
169-- | Enable or disable featrues.
170data Feature = Feature {
171      featInputClause    :: Bool    -- ^ Enable @input@ clause
172    , featOutputClause   :: Bool    -- ^ Enable @output@ clause
173    , featAutoOutput     :: Bool    -- ^ Automatic output when no assertions.
174    } deriving (Show, Eq, Ord)
175
176instance B.Default Feature where
177    def = Feature { featInputClause  = True
178                  , featOutputClause = True
179                  , featAutoOutput   = False
180                  }
181
